original_text: And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the Lord, that I will cut off thy horses out of the midst of thee, and I will destroy thy chariots:
korean_text: 여호와께서 이르시되 그 날에 이르러는 내가 네 군마를 네 가운데에서 멸절하며 네 병거를 부수며

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass in that day,
that I will cut off thy horses
out of the midst of thee,
and I will destroy thy chariots:
